text: فدعا ربه ان هؤلاء قوم مجرمون

translations.translation: He called out to his Lord, 'These are evildoing people.'
Then he called to his Lord: "These are a sinful people."
Then he called upon his Lord: “These are a criminal people.”
Moses addressed his Lord, saying, "Lord, these people are sinners".
He therefore prayed to his Lord, “These are a guilty nation!”
So he (Musa) called upon his Lord (saying): "These are indeed the people who are criminals."
Then he called upon his Lord: These are a guilty people.
And he called to his Lord, saying, 'These are a sinful people.'
And he cried unto his Lord, (saying): These are guilty folk.
Then he cried out to his Lord, "These are sinful people."
Then he called upon his Lord. these are a people guilty.
Then he invoked his Lord, [saying,] ‘These are indeed a guilty lot.’
(But they were aggressive:) then he cried to his Lord: "These are indeed a people given to sin."
(But they were aggressive), so he [Musa (Moses)] called upon his Lord (saying): "These are indeed the people who are Mujrimun (disbelievers, polytheists, sinners, criminals, etc.)."
Then he supplicated to his Lord saying: 'These are sinful people'
He appealed to his Lord: “These are a sinful people.”
And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.
[44:22] So he called to his Lord, saying, ‘These are indeed a guilty, an idolatrous, lot!’
(And he cried unto his Lord (saying): These are a guilty folk) these are idolatrous folk who brought destruction upon themselves.

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فدعا ربَّه } بعدما تمادوا على تكذيبه
 شاكياً إلى ربه: { أَنَّ هؤلاء } أي: بأن هؤلاء
 { قوم مجرمون } وهو تعريض بالدعاء عليهم
 بذكر ما استوجبوه
 ولذلك سمي دعاء
 وقيل: كان دعاؤه
: اللهم عجِّل لهم ما يستوجبونه بإجرامهم
 وقيل: هو قوله:
[القمر: 10] وقيل: قوله:
[يونس: 85] وقُرئ بالكسر على إضمار القول
 قال تعالى له بعدُ: { فأَسْرِ بعبادي ليلاً } والفاء تؤذن بشرط محذوف
 أي: إن كان الأمر كما تقول { فأسْرِ بعبادي } بني إسرائيل { ليلاً إِنكُم مُتَّبعون } أي: دبّر الله أن تتقدموا
 ويتبعكم فرعون وجنوده
 فننجّي المتقدمين
 ونغرف الباقين
